He pointed one finger to heaven and one finger to earth.
He took seven steps in a circular motion.
He looked in all directions and said.
'I alone am the honored one in the heavens and on earth.'
Yunmen Yan said.
'If I had seen that at the time.
I would have killed him with a blow and fed him to my dog.
